de-e-nu ša {m}da-hi-nu x x x ina UGU {m}{d}U.GUR-ha-mu x ku ti {m}ga-la-a {m}kar-ru-ru ARAD.MEŠ ša {m}sa-ka-a.a x ta-du-ku-u-ni 02 {LU₂}da-ma-x x+x ta-du-ku-u-ni {LU₂}ARAD ša {m}da-ma-nu-ri ta-du-ku-u-ni {MI₂}GEME₂ ša₂ {m}arba-il₃-a.a DUMU {m}za-ba-DINGIR-a.a ta-za-ri-qu-u-ni ina IGI {m}U.GUR-ŠEŠ {LU₂}x+x x hur-sa-an e-ti-mi₃-du Mannu-x-x x x ša EN.NUN-te e-si-šu₂-nu pa-qi-du-u-ni {m}DINGIR-a-ha-ri {LU₂}ša-IGI-x x x e-si-šu₂-nu pa-qi-du-u-ni {m}{d}UTU-ši-SU DUMU {m}e-x+x x Kalhaya {m}{d}PA-x+x x x {m}li-qi-su ša-IGI-de-na-ni {m}da-hi-nu ina IGI Šamaš iq-ṭi₂-bi ma-a UN.MEŠ an-nu-ti {m}{d}AD-ra-mu la i-du-ku-u-ni {m}{d}a-ra-miš-x x a-na Šamaš iq-bi-ma šum-ma x+x x ina {UZU}MUD₂ ša₂ UN.MEŠ an-nu-te x x x x x x qi ša₂ {MI₂}x+x x x x x x {UZU}MUD₂.MEŠ a-nu-x x x Addaru UD-07-KAM lim-mu Sin-šarru-uṣur {LU₂}EN.NAM {URU}hi-in-da₂-na
